definition: the remains of a body part that was functional at an earlier stage of life
details:
noun
- the remains of a body part that was functional at an earlier stage of life
= example: the remains of a body part that was functional at an earlier stage of life
- the elementary stages of any subject; usually plural
= example: the elementary stages of any subject; usually plural
= synonyms: first rudiment, first principle, alphabet, ABC, ABC's, ABCs
